2. flat - Paper is typically flat. This has a reasonable association.

Based on this analysis, the words most closely associated with "paper" appear to be:
1. page (very strong connection - pages are made of paper)
2. test (strong connection - tests are often written on paper)
3. flat (reasonable connection - paper is typically flat)
4. tag (moderate connection - tags can be paper)
5. rag (moderate connection - rag paper is a thing)
